site_name: 73 Tolworth Park RoadTolworthSurbitonKT6 7RJ
description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.00m in depth, maximum height of 3.04m and eaves height of 2.76m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition 18: The site shall be remediated in accordance with the approved measures and timescale and a verification report for all the remediation works shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority within 28 days of the report being completed and approved inwriting by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To protect human health, controlled waters, and the environment in line with DM 1 (Sustainable Design and Construction Standards) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.Condition 19:If, during the course of development, any contamination is found which has not been previously identified, work shall be suspended and additional measures for its remediation shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The remediation of the site shall incorporate the approved additional measures and a verification report for all the remediation works shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority within 28 days of the report being completed andapproved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To protect human health, controlled waters, and the environment in line with DM 1 (Sustainable Design and Construction Standards) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.The Environmental Health Officer has reviewed the Verification Report reference CGK/00708 submitted with this application and is satisfied that the information supplied is sufficient to discharge conditions 18 (verification report) and 19 (contamination) of permission 18/12924/FUL.
The description of the application will be finalised after the confirmation of loft conversion.
